RT hoeem I first saw $FUKU when it was at $2 mill using this filter, it’s now trading at $18 mill. No, not every pick using this filter is a guaranteed win, but it increases your chances. That’s the power of @ChainEDGE_io.
hoeem: On-chain sh*tcoining is akin to blackjack. Most are playing hands of 13-16, very risky. Tracking smart money lets you play hands of 19-20, less risk. Especially with a filter: > 0-5 days of age > Over $100k smart money I found 3 with that, like this, I’ll dm you them!
